name: Byzantium
startIntroPart2: Rebuild the greatest empire to ever grace the Mediterranean!
attacked: May God have mercy on you, for I will not
defeated: I'll see you in the afterlife
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniqueText: May buy [Cathedral], [Mosque] and [Pagoda] buildings with [Faith] without needing their respective religious belief. +1 [Culture] from [Cathedral], +1 [Faith] from [Mosque] and +1 [Food] from [Pagoda] buildings from the Medieval Era. When a city has all three built, gain +[15]% [Science] in that city.
uniques: May buy [Cathedral] buildings with [Faith] [in all cities]
May buy [Mosque] buildings with [Faith] [in all cities]
May buy [Pagoda] buildings with [Faith] [in all cities]
[+1 Culture] from every [Cathedral] <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[+1 Faith] from every [Mosque] <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[+1 Food] from every [Pagoda] <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[+15]% [Science] <in cities with a [Cathedral]> <in cities with a [Mosque]> <in cities with a [Pagoda]>
[-1 Gold] [in all cities] <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[-1 Gold] [in all cities] <starting from the [Industrial era]>

name: Crusader States
startIntroPart1: Greetings, mighty Baldwin I! The Counties of Edessa and Tripoli, Principality of Antioch and Kingdom of Jerusalem call await your command.
startIntroPart2: May you lead the 4 Crusader States into glory!
attacked: I'll see you twice; once on the battlefield and once in Hell!
hateHello: Speak quickly, for I have more important issues to attend to.
hateNo: A better deal would be offered from Satan himself.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniqueText:
Free [Swordsman] and [Settler] appears upon discovering Mathematics 
Free [Templar Knight] and [Settler] appears upon discovering Chivalry
Land units +15% strength and +100% maintenance costs
May purchase Great Generals for 500/1000/1500 [Gold] from the Ancient/Renaissance/Modern eras
uniques: [{Military} {Land}] units gain the [Valiantise] promotion <hidden from users>
[+100]% maintenance costs <for [{Military} {Land}] units>
Free [Settler] appears <upon discovering [Mathematics] technology>
Free [Swordsman] appears <upon discovering [Mathematics] technology>
Free [Settler] appears <upon discovering [Chivalry] technology>
Free [Templar Knight] appears <upon discovering [Chivalry] technology>

name: Mamluks
startIntroPart1: Marhaba, great al-Mustansir, of the emergent Mamluk Sultanate!
startIntroPart2: Show them who rules the desert!
attacked: May God have mercy on you, for I will not
defeated: I'll see you in the afterlife
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniqueText: Cost of purchasing land units -33% and all units gain +50% XP, may buy [Mosque] buildings with [Faith] without the religious belief, [+2 Gold] from every [Mosque], [+25]% [Gold] from every [Mosque].
uniques: May buy [Mosque] buildings with [Faith] [in all cities]
[+2 Gold] from every [Mosque]
[+25]% [Gold] from every [Mosque]
[Gold] cost of purchasing [Land] units [-33]%
[+50]% XP gained from combat

name: Rome
startIntroPart1: Ave Caesar Augustus, Emperor of Rome and Dominus of the Roman Empire! Your empire was the most powerful and feared of all in Western civilization. The Roman people crafted so brilliantly its culture, law, art, and warfare, that no one could contest the supremacy of Rome. Force and Honor led to glorious conquests, a domination of all the lands from Spain in the west to Syria in the east, even reaching the remote barbarian lands of England and Germany. Roman art and architecture have been praised for millenia and have been envied by all lesser civilizations who have followed.
startIntroPart2: O glorious Imperator, your people celebrate you and ask for the glory of Rome! In these times of darkness, the Pax Romana will be a beacon of light for all! Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: My treasury contains little and my soldiers are getting impatient... (sigh) ...therefore you must die.
attacked: So brave, yet so stupid! If only you had a brain similar to your courage.
defeated: The gods have deprived Rome of their favour. We have been defeated.
denounced: I didn't believe you had this kind of backbone.
introduction: I greet you. I am Augustus, Imperator and Pontifex Maximus of Rome. If you are a friend of Rome, you are welcome.
tradeRequest: I offer this, for your consideration.
uniques: [+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[+50]% [Gold] from Trade Routes
[-33]% maintenance on road & railroads
